data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11771 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 107 believers in the state of Anuradhapura into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Pashtun, Pathan people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, guide seekers in Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka has a population of 1,259,600.

We estimate Anuradhapura has 107 people who might know Jesus, 96,359 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,163,134 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11,771 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Anuradhapura.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
